Mystical heroes, blood mages are high elves adept at controlling magic, blood and life. The Prince received predictions of the future and decided to change the fate of the elves. The high elves began to turn to the darkest parts of magic, abandoning the water and frost spells of the Kirin Tor for the fire and blood of what some people fear to be demonic magic. The most famous and the first of the blood mages was Kael'thas Sunstrider. All hail Kael'thas!
Grand Blood Magister(Magistrix). Strongest magician. He will destroy the world for Quel'Thalas. The great defender of Quel'Thalas.

Induct Descendant
As the blood of dragons flows through your veins, it follows that your descendants do as well. Choose one from among them and induct them into the society.
To complete this mission you need to §Gright-click§! on the portrait of your target and choose to §YInduct§! them.
Pick the Intrigue Focus

While all dragons guard their secrets and treasure vaults carefully, there comes a time when even the most meticulous must focus on staying one step ahead of would-be pursuers. It is time for you to focus on intrigue.
To complete this mission, pick the §Y'Intrigue'§! focus in the Character screen.
Amass Arcane Energy
Nothing matters more to mages than the energy. Power and knowlege is ours way. Do whatever it takes to fill your labaratory with arcane cristals.
To complete this mission, amass 500 gold and select §Y'Everything is ready to start the ritual'§! in the Intrigue Menu.
Become Grand Magister!
Everything you have been working towards for years has been leading up to this moment. You are at last ready to unleash your true ambitions.
To complete this mission, select §Y'Become Grand Magister!'§! in the Intrigue Menu.
Become Blood Mage!
Everything you have been working towards for years has been leading up to this moment. You are at last ready to unleash your true ambitions.
To complete this mission, select §Y'Become Blood Mage!'§! in the Intrigue Menu.
Outlast Disease
Harmless to ordinary humans, a lethal virus is spreading towards your realm. Anybody could be a carrier... only by going into seclusion is there a chance of surviving this invisible killer.
To complete this mission, remain in seclusion until [Root.Society.GetName] contact you again.
Resist Evil

Dragons are persecuted by many as beings of great evil. Why validate these accusations by clinging to moral insanity? You must cleanse your mind so that you will be flawless before [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
To complete this mission, select §Y'Resist Evil'§! in the Intrigue Menu.
Decipher Secrets

The history of Dragons is long and storied. Many secrets and powers await those patient enough to study the dusty tomes of old. [Root.Society.GetName] have entrusted you with an encyphered scroll. Decipher its secrets and the knowledge of the ancients will be yours.
To complete this mission you have to carefully study the provided scrolls to reveal new insights.
Prolong Life
Absorb nature 's life energy.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on character's portrait, in order to rejuvenate, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!. Chances of side effects scale with mage level.
Using the magic of blood, you seek an opportunity to add 1 health the organism of someone.\nThis very strong spell to rejuvenate the friends.
Life Purification
Cleaning the body with vital energy and blood.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on character's portrait, in order to purificate, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!. Chances of side effects scale with mage level.
Using the magic of blood, you seek an opportunity to heal the organism of someone.\nThis very strong spell purificate the health of the friends.
Spell to fight rivals.
Using the magic of blood, you seek an opportunity to weaken the organism of the enemy. This very strong curse undermines the health of the rival.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on character's portrait, in order to gain curse, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!. Chances of side effects scale with mage level.
Using the magic of blood, you seek an opportunity to weaken the organism of the enemy.\nThis very strong curse undermines the health of the rival.
Purificate Body
Cleaning the body with vital energy and blood.
Spell to increase lifespawn and health.
Using the energy of life obtained from the blood of enemies you prolong life and enhance health.
Write Magic Theory
As an experienced blood mage, you can use your knowlege and skills to write a great magic book.
Search for Magic Artifact
By poring over ancient tomes you can attempt to uncover a new magic artifact.
Determine the area of magic you wish write to the book.
Determine the degree of effort you wish to devote to the search.\nSuccess varies depending on the amount of §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§! invested.

Construct Magic Fortress
Begin construction of magic fortress. It will be the perfect place to store gold and other artifacts...
Enables §Gright-clicking§! any Castle holdings you own to increase their gold income for fifty years, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
Resist Fel
[Root.Society.GetName] pride themselves on mental fortitude, often taking time to resist any fel influences that seek to taint them.
Go into meditation for a short time to purge your mind of stress and insanity.
Enables the decision to go into seclusion for a short time to remove negative traits.
Everything is ready to start the ritual
With enough magic your labaratory will be the envy of blood dragons and gods alike.
Completes the §Y'Amass Arcane'§! mission.
Unlock Demonic Fire
Your diligent research into demonic secrets allows you to use new magic abilities on the battlefield.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait, in order to gain a special Commander trait, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
Unlock Dragonheart
Your patient study of draconic secrets allows you to tap into your ancestry for increased endurance.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait, in order to gain a powerful character modifier, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.

Everything you have been working towards for years has been leading up to this moment. You are at last ready to unleash your true ambition.

Upon reaching rank 5, your next mission will allow you to become grand magister.

Blood Mage
Upon reaching rank 3, your next mission will allow you to become blood mage.
Put a magic tattoo.
By following the ancient instructions precisely you can put a special magic tattoo that will empower your mental acuity and abilities. Side effects may vary

Enforce Blood Elf Culture
It is time for [From.Society.GetName] to take land and assert their dominance over this county.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! the title shield of a county to convert the local population to Blood Elf culture.
Remove Lawless Presence
Send out some magic guards to rout the thieves and smugglers that infest this province.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! the title shield of a Blood Elf culture province to remove negative modifiers.

You make progress in deciphering the ancient scroll.
You struggle to make progress in deciphering the ancient scroll.
You suffer a major setback in deciphering the ancient scroll.

Blood Staff magic association welcome you. We use some magic theories about life, fel, void, blood and souls. This is for power. For Quel'Thalas. As such, you are entitled to join [From.Society.GetName] and learn more about forbidden magic. All hail Kael'thas, All hail Quel'Thalas.

Signed,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Tell me more about blood magic...
This is fel magic.

Although you have yet to be formally inducted into The Blood Staff, you have been training and honing your abilities. Decoding cyphers, eavesdropping, learning how to move silently without being followed, there are many such necessities when operating in a secret society.
Every new skill brings me closer to the truth.
I'm not cut out for this...

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The time has come for us to expand our influence. It has not escaped our notice that your descendants have the same blood magic heritage as you. Induct one of them into [Root.Society.GetName].

Signed,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Your success in inducting a new member into the society has been noted. They show much promise and will make a valuable contribution to [Root.Society.GetName].

Signed,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
My legacy shall endure for all time.

With great care, you scribe a letter to [new_recruit.GetFirstName]. You are sure to include several reasons that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] should take this invitation seriously, as well as detailed instructions on how to contact [Root.Society.GetName]. You then send the letter on its way, leaving no indication of your involvement.
Now we wait.

A letter arrived for you today from an unknown sender. Opening it in private, you discover that it seems to be a personal invitation to join a secret society calling themselves [From.Society.GetName]. Enclosed are instructions on how to respond if you so choose.
Send the reply as instructed.
Destroy it before anybody else sees it.

Already the letter you sent to [From.GetFirstName] is bearing fruits. Your agents report that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] has delivered a reply indicating an expression of interest to [Root.Society.GetName].
Excellent.
It seems the letter you sent to [From.GetFirstName] was for nothing. There has been no reply of any kind.
I was a fool to think [From.GetSubjectPronoun] could be trusted.

Arranging for some private time with [new_recruit.GetFirstName], you secretly bring along several other blood mages [From.GetPossPronoun] age, encouraging them to have fun playing in the secluded garden you have set aside for this encounter.
This shall be a special memory for [From.GetObjectPronoun].
Today one of your relatives brought you to a small grove where there were two blood mages waiting for you. For hours the three of you played and roughhoused in the secluded clearing.
Yay! These blood mages are fun!
They are far too rough for me...

The blood mages gathering you arranged for [From.GetFirstName] was a great success. Once [From.GetSubjectPronoun] and the blood mages had settled down after a few hours of play, you take [From.GetFirstName] aside and explain the nature of [Root.Society.GetName], as well as the importance of secrecy.
Welcome to your people, [From.GetFirstName].
Despite your best efforts, [From.GetFirstName] did not enjoy [From.GetPossPronoun] time with the other blood mages, who played far too rough for [From.GetObjectPronoun].
Those darn disciples!

Having gained access to your [new_recruit.GetFirstName]'s bedchamber, you open up an old story book filled with all manner of fables and legends. Illuminated by the soft glow of a candle, you read a tale to [new_recruit.GetFirstName], enthralling [new_recruit.GetObjectPronoun] with a story about a powerful mage that rescued a demon hunter girl from a tyrannical druid.
Once upon a time, there lived a beautiful demon hunter girl...

Last night one of your relatives showed up and read to you a story from an old elf book... It was about a beautiful demon hunter girl, an evil druid... and a powerful mage who died for the demon hunter girl! After hearing the demon hunter girl's name, you 're sad to realize it 's a true story. Sad story about Illysanna...
I should find out more about demon magic!
What a nightmare! Demon hunters are scary...

[From.GetFirstName] is completely enraptured by your storytelling, hanging on your every word. Once you finish, you tell [From.GetObjectPronoun] to keep this story a secret, and to seek out the demon's magic once [From.GetSubjectPronoun] comes of age.
[From.GetFirstName] will do me proud.

As you read the storybook to [From.GetFirstName], you observe [From.GetObjectPronoun] visibly fidgeting and squirming. Pausing, you ask what is wrong, only for [From.GetObjectPronoun] to start tearing up, terrified at the very thought of demon's magic.
And it was my best story too!

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

As you know, many label us as evil and immoral mages. Why should we validate these accusations by harbouring abhorrent and unstable tendencies? We would like you to meditate for a time and purge your soul of fel corruption.

Signed,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

It pleases [Root.Society.GetName] to see your spirit purified and uplifted after your recent meditation. Such efforts help pave the way for future acceptance of blood magic and our destiny.

Signed,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Fel just energy like arcane [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Magic is my instrument. It 's not a gift from the gods or a fanaticism of priest. This is my art, which has been reinforced by my effort! Forbidden magic? What fools came up with that word. With diligent meditation, consultation of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] and deep thought I will be able to manipulate the darkness that lies within fel magic.
My story just begins.
After several weeks dedicated to my meditation, I feel I am ready to direct my efforts towards resolving my inner conflict in a specific area.
A magician who 's afraid of fel magic is weak. Warlock without ambition is worm.
I must learn to restrain my cravings.
Get out of my head demons!
These dark thoughts are holding me back!
I shall strive to serve Quel'thalas as a pious blood mage.
It seems that word has got to [Root.Society.GetName] that I did not perform the meditation they expected of me.
What's with them anyway? There's nothing wrong with me.

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Do you ignore arcane energy? Amass a hoard of arcane energy immediately so that you cease to be an embarrassment to [Root.Society.GetName].

Signed,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

After several years of effort your ritual is finally complete. As the final step that will make you more stronger, you feel a rising energy within you, knowing that so much arcane energy is all yours to use or admire as you see fit.
No one can stop me now!
The majority of the population in [From.GetName] have embraced [Root.Culture.GetName] culture.

Elves have been spotted killing discordant people [From.GetName]! Strangely, the majority of the population have chosen to welcome their new [FromFrom.Culture.GetName] overlords, leaving only a token resistance that has since gone to ground.

The title of [Root.GetSocietyRank] certainly has its perks. With only a suggestion, the Mages that inhabit [From.GetName] razed every thieves guild and robber hideout in sight. Already the commoners feel safer knowing the lawless elements have been purged from the region.

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

It has been brought to our attention that you are perhaps not spending the appropriate effort on matters of intrigue. We would like to encourage you to set aside matters of state and focus on covering your tracks from any would-be pursuers.

Signed,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We are happy to hear that you have devoted your time to matters of intrigue. May the coming years of secrecy reward you with a longer life than those who would seek to harm [Root.Society.GetName].

Signed,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Nobody shall be the wiser.

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

You are ready to assume your true ambition. Embrace your destiny and be blood mage!

Signed,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

Everything has been leading up to this. Yet, at the critical moment, you hesitate. Fondling the reagens in your hands, thoughts rush through your mind. What will the courtiers think? How will the people react? A blood mage ruling over them?
With a few choice words the people will embrace this change.
Hire more guards to keep the peace.
I cannot let such fears obstruct my destiny.
Perhaps this is not the time...
Having learned the theory of blood magic and many other forbidden schools of magic you were ready for a long time. The power, ambition and prosperity of the elf people is what drives you.
Now you can feel blood in creatures!

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

You are ready to assume your true ambition. Embrace your destiny and be grand magister!

Signed,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Everything has been leading up to this. Yet, at the critical moment, you hesitate. Do I want that kind of responsibility?
Power and responsibility are quite a normal reward for the worthy.
Perhaps this is not the time...
Having learned the theory of blood magic and many other forbidden schools of magic you were ready for a long time. The power, ambition and prosperity of the elf people is what drives you.
Now you are the most powerfull mage in Quel'thalas!

As your trusted labourers finish work on the magic fortress at [From.GetName], you personally arrange for a myriad of traps to be set up to secure the arcane vault, as well as a magic canons that protect the fortress from low races. Soon the work is complete and you admire the finished result.

Investigating vague rumours and forgotten libraries to find ancient relics is no simple task. The question is how much of my resources should I devote to this search?
I shall make a modicum of effort.
This warrants a serious investigation.
I shall delve into the most cryptic scrolls I have!

Despite my best efforts, my search for the night elf relic has come up with nothing. Were the rumours false? Did somebody else find the artifact before me? Was my translation of the scrolls inaccurate?
Where did I go wrong?

Your investigation into the artifact has turned up a mysterious key made out of a strange unknown metal. Inscribed with magic runes along the key, it reminds you of a certain chest you found some time ago
Your search has uncovered a strange chest made of an unknown metal. Try as you might, you haven't been able to force the chest open and its contents remain a mystery.
Your search for night elf relics has turned up a skull full with fel energy. Although small, it carries the air of ancient war.
How cute.
Your search for a troll artifact has come up with a strange loa totem. You can feel strange energy inside.
It 's worth studying troll magic artefact.
Ugly old cloak of ancient war times. A magic massive can be found on the inside side. Artefact can be useful.
You read the inscription on the inside. "Your father loves you dear Illysanna..." What this mean?
Your artifact investigation has uncovered several old highborn magic book. Some pages in good conditions.
This was worth all the effort.
Your search into elf artifacts has uncovered notes on ancient magic. Although simplistic, it could still be of some use in future translation work.
Might come in handy one day.
Nice magic dagger. A very long time ago, these weapon killed many demons.
Cool!
This is strange staff. This is not night elf artefact.
Good weapon.
Ancient elf sword. Very qualitative work done for elite highborne. An incredibly powerful arcane aura. These weapon not influenced by time.
Quel'sin. This sword will help to restore greatness to the elves!
You have successfully cursed your enemy.
The bastard will suffer!

After studying the impact of fel, you found a way to open the channel to the fire plan without arcana. By replacing arcana, you have achieved the enriching of the power of fire spells and spend much less energy! By talking about it with the comrades, you 've found a new way to create fiery spells. Now you have a demonic fire.
My foes will scamper before me!

Comparing your blood to the various samples given to you by [Root.Society.GetName] has been a painstaking progress. Taking various potions, abstaining from certain foods, yet now you have it: you were able to successfully assimilate the blood of the eredar.
The blood of eredar flows through me!

The ancient scrolls tell of special titan rune that boosts mental and physical prowess. There are several recipes, each boosting a different faculty. This poses a question: which of the incenses will you attempt to recreate?
Powder of Strength.
Smoke of Shadows.
Vapours of Insight.
Midnight Musk.

After carefully preparing the incense according to the ancient recipe you ignite it and begin to inhale the thick aroma emanating from the powder. Within moments you feel your mind awaken with new insights while your body swells with renewed strength.

After carefully preparing the rune according to the ancient recipe you put it on hand and begin to full it with arcane. Within moments you feel your mind awaken with new insights while your body swells with renewed strength.

After carefully preparing the rune according to the ancient recipe you put it on hand and begin to full it with arcane. Within moments you feel your mind awaken, racing through logical problems that once stumped you.
After carefully preparing the rune according to the ancient recipe you put it on hand and begin to full it with arcane. Within moments you feel your body covered in a soft warmth, ready for breeding.
My eyes are opened.

After the initial burst of power you first felt after rune in hand was full of arcane, your mind has begun to grow increasingly clouded and confused. Something must have gone wrong... perhaps you somehow mistranslated the recipe?
Ugh... my head...

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

There is much about our ancient history we have yet to understand. Decipher the scrolls we have sent you so that we know the secrets of the demon magic that roamed the world long ago.

Signed,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

Late nights of study have begun to prey on your concentration. It's hard to keep focused when you're underslept. Catching yourself yawning, you wonder if you will ever understand this archaic writing.
Perhaps I should try some sort of draught...
I cannot neglect my limits any longer.
Hour after hour stretches by with no result. The scroll is as alien to you as when you started, with the various markings on the parchment seemingly random to you.
If I focus I can decipher this!
I should take it easy.

As you continue to work on the ancient scroll, you hear a cry coming from outside the window. You peer down and see a boy being pushed to the ground, surrounded by a few older boys. It's clear the young boy is being bullied by the others.
The bullies must be stopped.
I must focus. Someone else will come to his aid.

Buried away in your study you find yourself surrounded by books of all kinds. Although dusty, each of them calls out to you with interesting titles and presentation. Surely it wouldn't hurt to take a break from the translation work?
I've been meaning to get to these...
Another time perhaps.

After many fruitless nights staring at the strange symbols that cover the scroll provided to you by [Root.Society.GetName], the true meaning of a key phrase suddenly jumps out at you, allowing you to translate several more areas of the text.
Finally starting to get somewhere!

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We note your fine work in deciphering the nathrezim scrolls we sent you. All of [Root.Society.GetName] are enriched with the discovery of this new knowledge.

Signed,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Another step closer to our heritage.

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Word has reached us that you have been neglecting the important translation work that we assigned to you. It seems we must find someone more invested in our cause to do the work instead.

Signed,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
They dare to accuse me of inactivity?!
Those dusty scrolls that I had abandoned went missing today.
Whatever.

Many have noticed your absence from court of late. People are beginning to speculate what might be consuming your time and energy with the many nights spent out of sight, deciphering the ancient scroll.
I shall fool everyone with a convincing cover story!
These rumours shall soon pass.
Eredar blood!
